summary: This is an email from Jeanne M. Christensen, a partner at Wigdor LLP, to an external recipient regarding the transmission of a document described as a 'journal'. The email indicates the sender does not have time to separate text from the journal and will send it the next day. The communication is marked as potentially containing confidential or privileged information.

persons.name: Jeanne M. Christensen
persons.context: Sender of the email, a lawyer who is transmitting or discussing a document described as a 'journal' and indicates she will send it the following day.

events.title: Email regarding journal transmission
events.description: Jeanne M. Christensen sends an email stating she does not have time to separate text from a journal and will get it to the recipient the next day.

keyFacts: The email is from attorney Jeanne M. Christensen of Wigdor LLP.
The subject matter concerns a 'journal' that needs to have text separated from it.
The communication is marked as potentially containing confidential or attorney-client privileged information.
The email is dated March 7, 2024, indicating ongoing legal activity or document review related to the Epstein case years after his death.
The sender's law firm address in New York is provided.
